name: StorageByMail.com
tag_list: storage, self-storage, mini-storage, cloud-storage, physical-storage, shipping, delayed-shipping, usps, fedex, ups
overview: StorageByMail.com provides an alternative to traditional self storage. Storage is centralized in a single, low-cost warehouse that customers access via the mail. The company offers prepaid shipping labels for sending boxes to storage and free round-trip postage.
